com.polarion.alm.tracker

Interface IDocumentsManager

  • Deprecated. 
    The 2010 Live Documents are deprecated. You are probably looking for API related to current LiveDocs - see IModuleManager.

    @Deprecated
public interface IDocumentsManager
    This interface contains special methods for work with work items stored in document storages (Word/Excel for now) and also with the documents themselves.
    Author:
    POLARION SOFTWARE

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • createWorkItem

        IWorkItem createWorkItem(IProject project,
                         ILocation location)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates an instance of work item, which (after being persistent) will be stored in document on given location.

        Note, that this function just creates the java instance, which is not persisted in any way and call to the IPObject.save() method is necessary to persist it.

        Parameters:
        project -
        location - Of existing document.
        Returns:
        the unpersisted IWorkItem

      • getRootDocumentLocation

        ILocation getRootDocumentLocation(IProject project)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns root document folder for specific project
        Parameters:
        project - - project to retriev root document location
        Returns:
        ILocation or null if project can't contains the documents

      • getSubFolders

        java.util.Collection getSubFolders(ILocation location)
        Deprecated. 
        Retriev the sublocations for given location. Can't return null.
        Parameters:
        location - - parent location
        Returns:
        collection of ILocation

      • getDocuments

        java.util.Collection getDocuments(ILocation location)
        Deprecated. 
        Retrieves the documents contained in the given location. It the location is a location of a document a collection with the single document will be returned.
        Parameters:
        location - location to retrive documents
        Returns:
        Collection of IDocument, never return the null, returns empty collection if the location does not exist.

      • getDocument

        IDocument getDocument(ILocation location)
        Deprecated. 
        Retrieves the document with the given location.
        Parameters:
        location - location of retrived document. Use location with revision set to retrieve a particular revision of the document.
        Returns:
        IDocument, or null if Location doesn't point to valid IDocument

        Parameters:

        documentPath -
        revision - can be null
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if no such project exists or project id is null.

      • getDocumentHistory

        java.util.List getDocumentHistory(IDocument document)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the List of IRevisionMetaData objects

        Note, that the documents are loaded from particular revision and this function returns the history up to this revision. If the document was not taken from head, than the history will not reach the head.

        Parameters:
        document -
        Returns:
        List of IRevisionMetaDatas

      • getDiff

        java.util.Map getDiff(IDocument document,
                      java.lang.String revision01,
                      java.lang.String revision02)
        Deprecated. 
        Compare and return the diff between two revisoins of a single document Returns the Map from ILocalId to IPObjectDiff
        Parameters:
        document -
        revision01 - - e.g. some historical revision
        revision02 - - e.g. head revision
        Returns:
        Map ILocalId -> IPObjectDiff

      • getDocumentWorkItemsQuery

        java.lang.String getDocumentWorkItemsQuery(ILocation documentLocation)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the query to get the list of items stored in the given document.

        Unlike usual queries, the query will return also the objects with local ids.

        Parameters:
        documentLocation -
        Returns:
        Query, which can be passed e.g. to ITrackerService.queryWorkItems(String, String)

      • getFolderWorkItemsQuery

        java.lang.String getFolderWorkItemsQuery(ILocation documentLocation)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the query to get the list of items stored in the fiven folder and it's subfolders.

        Unlike usual queries, the query will return also the objects with local ids.

        Parameters:
        documentLocation -
        Returns:
        Query, which can be passed e.g. to ITrackerService.queryWorkItems(String, String)

      • transformImgUrlsInHTML

        java.lang.String transformImgUrlsInHTML(java.lang.String html,
                                        IImgUrlFactory factory)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Deprecated. 
        Transforms img urls in given html string from workitemimg:... to other format using given factory. Use getPortalImgUrlFactory to get factory creating urls to servlet returning the images.
        Parameters:
        html -
        factory -
        Returns:
        the transformed url
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Since:
        3.2

      • transformImgUrl

        java.lang.String transformImgUrl(java.lang.String url,
                                 IImgUrlFactory factory)
        Deprecated. 
        Transforms img url from workitemimg: to other format using given factory. If the given url does not start with workitemimg: returns the given url withour changes. Use getPortalImgUrlFactory to get factory creating urls to servlet returning the images.
        Parameters:
        url -
        factory -
        Returns:
        the transformed url
        Since:
        3.2
